author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

This PR addresses a number of technical issues related to MTD code, without implying any effect on its output. In detail:

- Move ```EventSetup``` use to ```ESGetToken``` (~~with the exception of digitization, already addressed by @makortel in #31697~~)
- Remove the ```RecHitTools``` class, now obsolete and unused
- Remove the ```RecoMTD/Navigation``` package, unused and not needed after the developments in #33272 (no point in maintaining useless code)
- clang-tidy cleaning of code

#### PR validation:

code compiles and run, geometry unit tests look ok, and test wf 34634.0 do not show differences in its DQM output
title: MTD geometry, digitization, reconstruction and validation: technical cleaning of code
